title: Foods to Help Boost Immunity | Northwestern Medicine Health & Fitness Centers
author: Zapier
description: Courtesy of the Cleveland clinic.com, here are some foods you can incorporate into your diet today to boost immunity.
cleaned_text: Huntley Fitness Staff Courtesy of the Cleveland clinic.com, here are some foods you can incorporate into your diet today to boost immunity. Vitamin C Spinach, Kale, Strawberries and Bell peppers Vitamin E Almonds, Peanuts, Hazelnuts, Sunflower seeds Vitamin A Carrots, Sweet potatoes, Dark leafy vegetables, Cantaloupe Iron Chicken, Canned light tuna, Turkey, Oysters, Beans, Broccoli, Kale Zinc Yogurt, Crab, Baked beans, lean meats Reference: [https://health.clevelandclinic.org/eat-these-foods-to-boost-your-immune-system/](https://health.clevelandclinic.org/eat-these-foods-to-boost-your-immune-system/) Email Updates: Get updates sent directly to your inbox!
